import*as Types from"../types/cartTypes";var setCartData=function setCartData(data){return{type:Types.SET_CART,payload:{data:data}};};var addToCart=function addToCart(data){return{type:Types.ADD_TO_CART,payload:{data:data}};};var increase=function increase(data){return{type:Types.UPDATE.increase,payload:{data:data}};};var decrease=function decrease(data){return{type:Types.UPDATE.decrease,payload:{data:data}};};var deleteCart=function deleteCart(index){return{type:Types.DELETE,payload:{index:index}};};// SCR 
var setScroll=function setScroll(toggle){return{type:Types.SET_SCROLL,payload:{toggle:toggle}};};export{setCartData,addToCart,increase,decrease,deleteCart,setScroll};
